    Pokemon Population Sampler - Samples specified pokemon and traits

    pokemon.pop.sim.Rd

    Pokemon Population Sampler - Samples specified pokemon and traits

    Usage

    pokemon.pop.sim(pokemon, n, traits, vary, sd = 1)

    Arguments

    pokemon

    name of pokemon in title case

    n

    number of pokemon to return

    traits

    column name from pokedex describing pokemon traits

    vary

    controls whether to vary numerical trait values

    sd

    optional parameter to influence how much variation to add

    Value

    a dataframe of pokemon with selected traits

    Examples

    pokemon.pop.sim("Bulbasaur", 10)
#> No traits selected. No variation applied
#>    X pokedex_number      name generation status type_number type_1 type_2
#> 1  0              1 Bulbasaur          1 Normal           2  Grass Poison
#> 2  0              1 Bulbasaur          1 Normal           2  Grass Poison
#> 3  0              1 Bulbasaur          1 Normal           2  Grass Poison
